ARTICLE.TITLE: Deputies: Sarasota man arrested after hitting patrol car with stolen vehicle
ARTICLE.TEXT: A deputy says that when he got out of his patrol car which was behind the Ford, Foley placed the car in reverse and struck the patrol car. The deputy was not injured. When the overhead lights and siren were activated, deputies say that Foley then proceeded to recklessly drive the Ford through the front of the dealership and narrowly missed hitting multiple parked vehicles and pedestrians.
